page.body:
This sample site allows you to manage a blog using multiple authors, categories and tags for the posts.

All content is exposed by a flexible REST API:

get-* endpoints expect an 'id' as parameter

  • /api/1/get-post.json
  • /api/1/get-author.json

list-* endpoints support 'start' and 'rows' paramaeters for pagination

  • /api/1/list-authors.json
  • /api/1/list-categories.json
  • /api/1/list-tags.json

list-posts also supports 'author', 'categories', 'tags' parameters. A special 'q' parameter supports text search in the body of the posts.

  • /api/1/list-posts.json
